snippet: The 2013 GS 350 looks mildly odd and alien, but this fourth-generation GS, with its 306-horsepower 3.5-liter V-6, is the most entertaining midrange Lexus sedan in memory.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of 2013 Lexus GS 350 sport sedan.
lead_paragraph: The 2013 GS 350 looks mildly odd and alien, but this fourth-generation GS, with its 306-horsepower 3.5-liter V-6, is the most entertaining midrange Lexus sedan in memory.

headline.seo: Action-Oriented Sedan With a Predatory Spirit
